titles.title: HEROIAM SLAVA Act of 2023
Halting Enrichment of Russian Oligarchs and Industry Allies of Moscow's Schemes to Leverage its Abject Villainy Abroad Act of 2023
HEROIAM SLAVA Act of 2023
A bill to block the property of Russian state-owned entities.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Halting Enrichment of Russian Oligarchs and Industry Allies of Moscow's Schemes to Leverage its Abject Villainy Abroad Act of 2023 or the HEROIAM SLAVA Act of 2023
This bill requires the President to exercise certain authorities to block all transactions in property belonging to any entity owned or controlled by Russia if such property is within the United States or in the possession or control of a U.S. person.
